body:
OK, now I know I'm not on an old branch.  I just rebased my PR onto dev:

https://github.com/LLNL/spack/pull/1250

Now I get this when I run flake8 tests:

```
$ ./run-flake8-tests 
Dependencies found.
./run-flake8-tests: line 31: ./changed_files: No such file or directory
No Python files were modified.
```

:(
title: run-flake8 confused after rebase
